OOC: Yessssss. There can be only one!

::Hot Rod::

The words about Optimus struck hard. He had always blamed himself for
it. If he hadn't jumped in Optimus could have killed Megatron right
there at Autobot city. Instead Megatron used him as a hostage, and shot
Prime several time. Optimus later died.
His thoughts were interupted with the drop kick. He hit the ground, and
strugled back to his feet.
"Just how the hell are you a million years old? There wern't any
Maximals or Predicons then. Just a small war on Cybertron between the
Autobots and Decepticons!" 
He sent a round house kick at Unitron's chest.
